meanings.definition: Showing signs of eccentricity or madness
meanings.sent1: The man down the street is the dottiest person I know.
meanings.sent2: She wore the dottiest outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: His dottiest ideas always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a dottiest maze of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The dottiest character in the story was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Having a large number of dots or spots
meanings.sent1: The dottiest dress she owned was covered in polka dots.
meanings.sent2: The dottiest painting in the gallery was a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The dottiest cat had spots all over its fur.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was like a dottiest canvas of stars.
meanings.sent5: The dottiest rug in the room added a playful touch.

meanings.definition: Acting in a slightly crazy or foolish manner
meanings.sent1: He made the dottiest decision to wear mismatched socks.
meanings.sent2: The dottiest thing she did was dance in the rain.
meanings.sent3: Their dottiest antics always brought smiles to our faces.
meanings.sent4: In his dottiest moment, he tried to juggle eggs.
meanings.sent5: The dottiest behavior at the party was entertaining.
